name: GKPerlinNoiseSource
desc: A procedural noise generator whose output is a type of fractal coherent noise resembling natural phenomena such as clouds and terrain.

items.name: init(frequency: Double, octaveCount: Int, persistence: Double, lacunarity: Double, seed: Int32)
items.desc: Initializes a Perlin noise source with the specified parameters.

items.name: var persistence: Double
items.desc: The rate at which successive octaves of the noise function decrease in amplitude.
